A

Actor - Class in com.tumblr.backboard
Coordinates the relationship between MotionImitators, Springs, and Performers on a single View.
Actor.Builder - Class in com.tumblr.backboard
Implements the builder pattern for Actor.
Actor.Builder(SpringSystem, View) - Constructor for class com.tumblr.backboard.Actor.Builder
Animates the given view with the default SpringConfig and automatically creates a SpringSystem.

Contains the imitators and listeners coupled to a single spring.
